Support

Get Involved

Donating to The Volunteer Economy helps grow the program to other communities and launch new innovative tools and applications. Your donations will go towards aiding suffering veterans and the poor of the world and helping them meet their basic needs (safety, security, food, clothing, shelter, light, air & water) and advanced needs (healthcare, education, jobs, new venture creation, etc.).

or speak with a representative
